title: [Large-Scale] Systematic Training Programs for Strengthening Physician-Educator Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic diagnostic and treatment knowledge in the medical field, with clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Focus on utilizing smartphone-based supplementary learning tools, feedback technology, and improving instructional methodologies.

learning_goals: Apply and demonstrate at least three effective feedback techniques for peer medical professionals
Improve instructional delivery skills by over 80% through peer evaluation after practical sessions
Develop educational plans integrating at least two adult learning theories and microlearning principles when designing training sessions
Master time management and audience engagement techniques through at least three simulated teaching practices

resources: Mobile Learning Support App (Feedback Training Edition)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
